puns.name: Abi
puns.pun: Orange you glad to see me?

puns.name: Simon
puns.pun: I sat down be cider and we talked for hours.

puns.pun: Well, it takes two to mango.

puns.pun: Honey, dew or dew not, there is no try.

puns.name: Kenneth
puns.pun: You hold the kiwi to my heart
